thread.title: At Walmart, the CEO Makes 1,188 Times as Much as the Median Worker

author: Sarah Nassauer
title: At Walmart, the CEO Makes 1,188 Times as Much as the Median Worker
text:
Walmart Inc. paid its median worker $19,177 last year, while Chief Executive Doug McMillon earned $22.8 million, according to a securities filing Friday.
That places the retailer 10th among S&P 500 companies with the widest gap in pay between the CEO and a typical worker, based on an analysis of more than 330 firms that have disclosed the figures so far.
